text.title: part8_The Raveonettes on love, death, desire and war
text.p:
Sune :
[
Laughs
]

hi.s:
DS : What would bother you more in bed , somebody who is overly
flatulent
, or somebody who speaks in a little baby voice ?

text.p:
Sune :
Uh ... probably the flatulent thing .
I never really liked that so much .

hi.s: DS : The baby voice ?

text.p:
Sune :
Nah , the baby voice is fine .

Sharin :
Ugh .
God , let 's see ... would
least
want to share the bed with ?
I think probably the baby voice would probably bother me the most .

hi.s: DS : Creep you out a bit ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Yeah .

hi.s: DS : Sharin do you find it difficult dating ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Yeah .
Intimacy .
Obviously because you are away so much it really takes a lot of work to keep things intimate with people I am seeing when I 'm away on the road .

hi.s: DS : How do you try to circumvent those problems ?
Sharin :

p.s: I try and keep on tour only three weeks at a time .

text.p:
Sune :
Which does n't work all the time ...

hi.s: Sharin :

p.s: I try to keep it to that and have some free time at home , which is typically , like , four days .

text.p:
Sune :
[
Laughs
]

Sharin :
And then I try to communicate a lot with the phone .
Skype
.

hi.s: DS :
What traits do you deplore in other people ?

text.p:
Sune :
Jealousy
.

Sharin :
Judgmental .
Narrow-minded .

Sune :
Ignorance
, yeah .

hi.s: DS : Any certain type of ignorance ?

text.p:
Sune :
Yeah , ignorance of people around them and of the world .

Sharin :
And
xenophobia
.
Racist people .

hi.s: DS :
Which traits do you deplore in yourselves ?

text.p:
Sharin :
I 'm lazy .
I 'm uptight and inhibited .

hi.s: DS : Are you really all those things ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Yeah .

hi.s: DS : And you deplore that about yourself ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Well , deplore is strong .
I just dislike it .

hi.s: DS : Do you do anything to get over those things ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Yeah , I try , but it 's not so easy .

hi.s:
DS : But I 've read interviews with you where you talk about the wild party scene in
Los Angeles
...

text.p:
Sharin :
Really ?

hi.s: DS : Yeah , in preparation for this I read where you talked about that in an interview ...

text.p:
Sharin :
That must have been me back in the day ! I 'm old now , you know , settled and I do n't go out now anymore .
I like to have fun , we have a lot of fun .

Sune :
I really like myself a lot , actually .
I 'm in a very good state ; I have my wife and I 'm very happy and positive ...

Sharin :
Selfish
!

Sune :
What ? !

Sharin :
You 're selfish .

Sune :
I 'm selfish ?
Really ?
You think ?

Sharin :
Yeah .

Sune :
Is that bad ?

Sharin :
[
Laughs
]

hi.s: DS : Is that the trait that you deplore in him ?

text.p:
Sharin :
Yeah , I would say so .

hi.s: DS : Is there a trait that you deplore in Sharin ?
Sharin :

text.p:
Sune :
Well , she 's late , and I hate that .
